title: Python Programming
description: A comprehensive course that covers from basics to advanced programming concepts in Python.
learningObjectives: Understand the fundamental concepts of Python
Write clean and efficient Python code
Manipulate data using Python's standard libraries

finalProjectDetails.overview: Final project will involve building a complex application using Python, integrating all concepts learned throughout the course
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit your final project code on the course submission platform along with a detailed readme explaining your design choices
